discussion_comments.comment_body: lets use `totalTasksSize?: number` instead, since we don't use the `| null` pattern anywhere else

discussion_comments.comment_body: I would point out, null and undefined aren't exactly the same thing, but probably OK to use in this case.

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -20,6 +20,8 @@ interface ExtensionStateContextType extends ExtensionState {
 	mcpServers: McpServer[]

discussion_comments.comment_body: @dcbartlett @saoudrizwan Talked with Saoud, will keep this way. The reason being that if the operation fails we want it to silently fail and just return null. In this way we can just not display the size.
